Text: Thanks for this Carsonx! It's perfect just like you said, you even included the banned & unaired episodes....now that's cool!

Do not waste your time trying to download Anime from here. Get it from http://bakabt.me/ . All seasons of Pokemon are available there. Seasons 1-11 is available as english dubbed and seasons 12-13 are available as english hardsubbed. And they are all freeleech at the moment so there is no worrying about ratios or whatever.
This is amazing! Thanks very much. Also, do you have the rest of the seasons?
